configuration.name: widget_08813322286822838
configuration.stem: Complete the sentences by choosing the correct terms.

feedBack.firstWrongHint: That’s not it. Think about the relationship between the different levels of organization in living things and try again.
feedBack.finalWrongHint: [That’s not it. /Well done.] The two main organ systems of a plant are the root system and the shoot system. The underground portion of the plant in the photograph is the root system. This plant’s root system is made up of individual, branching roots. Each root is an organ.

configuration.paragraph: The underground portion of this plant is an example of a(n) <<Option1>>. The branching network of individual <<Option2>> maximizes the amount of water and nutrients that can be taken up from the soil.
configuration.stemImageAlt: This photograph shows a small tree. It  shows the roots underground, as well as the stems and leaves.
